name: Running Out in Space!
description:
Running Out in Space! is a platformer game. While progressing through each level, the walls will become closer and closer from each other. Be careful, and use them at your advantage, while always trying not to run out of space!

Move : Q/D
Jump (double) :SPACE
Retry : R

EDIT : A new version is available with fixes on potential blockers in the flow. The original Compo version is for sure still available to download as well!
